displayName.french: Tu veux te frotter à moi ?

description.english: Engage Witch Time successfully 10 times.
description.spanish: Activa el Tiempo brujo 10 veces.
description.german: Mach 10 Mal erfolgreich Gebrauch von der Hexenzeit.
description.french: Utilise l'Envoûtement 10 fois.
description.italian: Aziona il Sabbat temporale 10 volte.
description.japanese: ウィッチタイムを１０回成功させろ

description.english: Engage Witch Time successfully 10 times consecutively.
description.spanish: Activa el Tiempo brujo 10 veces consecutivas.
description.german: Mach 10 Mal hintereinander Gebrauch von der Hexenzeit.
description.french: Utilise l'Envoûtement 10 fois de suite.
description.italian: Aziona il Sabbat temporale 10 volte di fila.
description.japanese: ウィッチタイムを連続で１０回成功させろ

description.english: Earn 10 Platinum Medals. Must be earned in 10 different battles.
description.spanish: Gana 10 medallas de platino. Tienes que ganarlas 10 en batallas distintas.
description.german: Verdiene dir 10 Platinmedaillen in 10 verschiedenen Kämpfen.
description.french: Gagne 10 médailles de platine qui doivent être gagnées dans 10 batailles différentes.
description.italian: Ottieni 10 Medaglie di platino in 10 battaglie differenti.
description.japanese: プラチナメダルを10回取れ（同じ戦闘は無効）

displayName.french: Un peu de ci, un peu de ça...

description.english: Create 20 Concoctions.
description.spanish: Prepara 20 pócimas.
description.german: Mische 20 Gebräue zusammen.
description.french: Crée 20 concoctions.
description.italian: Crea 20 miscugli
description.japanese: アイテム調合を20回行え

description.english: Kill an enemy by jumping on top of them.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo saltando sobre él.
description.german: Töte einen Feind, indem du auf ihn springst.
description.french: Tue un ennemi en sautant dessus.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico saltandogli sopra.
description.japanese: ジャンプ踏み付けのみで敵を一体倒せ

displayName.japanese: 気安く触るんじゃないの

description.english: Avert 10 enemy attacks with the Moon of Mahaa-Kalaa equipped.
description.spanish: Evita 10 ataques enemigos con la Luna de Mahaa-Kalaa equipada.
description.german: Weiche 10 feindlichen Angriffen mit dem Mond von Mahaa-Kalaa aus.
description.french: Évite 10 attaques ennemies en utilisant la Lune de Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.italian: Evita 10 attacchi nemici con la Luna di Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.japanese: 「マハーカーラの月」を装備して敵の攻撃を10回 弾き返せ

description.english: Counter 10 enemy attacks with the Moon of Mahaa-Kalaa equipped.
description.spanish: Contraataca tras 10 ataques enemigos con la Luna de Mahaa-Kalaa equipada.
description.german: Wirke 10 feindlichen Angriffen mit dem Mond von Mahaa-Kalaa entgegen.
description.french: Contre-attaque 10 fois en utilisant la Lune de Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.italian: Contrattacca 10 attacchi nemici con la Luna di Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.japanese: 「マハーカーラの月」を装備してカウンター攻撃を 10 回成功させろ

displayName.english: Touch And It Will REALLY Hurt
displayName.french: À trop se frotter, on douille
displayName.italian: Tocca e te ne pentirai DAVVERO

description.english: Counter three enemy attacks consecutively with the Moon of Mahaa-Kalaa equipped.
description.spanish: Contraataca tras 3 ataques enemigos consecutivos con la Luna de Mahaa-Kalaa equipada.
description.german: Wirke drei feindlichen Angriffen in Folge mit dem Mond von Mahaa-Kalaa entgegen.
description.french: Contre-attaque trois fois de suite en utilisant la Lune de Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.italian: Contrattacca 3 attacchi nemici consecutivi con la Luna di Mahaa-Kalaa.
description.japanese: 「マハーカーラの月」を装備してカウンター攻撃を連続 3 回成功させろ

description.english: Taunt and defeat five plus angered enemies while taking no damage. Gaze of Despair may be equipped.
description.spanish: Provoca y derrota a 5 o más enemigos sin recibir daños llevando la Mirada de desesperación equipada.
description.german: Verspotte und besiege mehr als 5 wütende Feinde, ohne Schaden zu nehmen. Leidensblick ist erlaubt.
description.french: Provoque et bats + de 5 ennemis en colère. Ne subis aucun dégât. Tu as droit au Regard du désespoir.
description.italian: Provoca e sconfiggi cinque nemici senza subire danni. Puoi usare lo Sguardo della disperazione.
description.japanese: 挑発され怒った敵を5体以上ノーダメージで倒せ（「絶望の眼差し」の使用も可）

displayName.japanese: ウィケッド ウィーブ使い

description.english: Execute a Wicked Weave attack while using Dodge Offset.
description.spanish: Haz un Ataque maleficio mientras estás haciendo un Combo interruptus.
description.german: Führe einen Hexenflechtenangriff aus, während Super-Ausweichen eingesetzt wird.
description.french: Fais une attaque d'Incantation en utilisant la Contre-esquive.
description.italian: Esegui un attacco Chioma Malefica durante il Combo Interruptus.
description.japanese: 「ダッヂ オフセット」でコンボを繋ぎ、「ウィケッド ウィーブ」を繰り出せ

displayName.japanese: ウィケッド ウィーブ マスター

description.english: Execute 20 Wicked Weave attacks while using Dodge Offset.
description.spanish: Haz 20 Ataques maleficio mientras estás haciendo un Combo interruptus.
description.german: Führe 20 Hexenflechtenangriffe aus, während Super-Ausweichen eingesetzt wird.
description.french: Fais 20 attaques d'Incantation en utilisant la Contre-esquive.
description.italian: Esegui 20 attacchi Chioma Malefica durante il Combo Interruptus.
description.japanese: 「ダッヂ オフセット」でコンボを繋ぎ、「ウィケッド ウィーブ」を20回繰り出せ

displayName.japanese: つまらないものを斬らせないで

description.english: Kill 20 enemies using only Iai-Jutsu with Shuraba. (Iai-Jutsu performed by holding the Y button.)
description.spanish: Mata a 20 enemigos usando sólo Iai-Jutsu con Shuraba. (Iai-Jutsu se hace manteniendo Y pulsado.)
description.german: Töte 20 Feinde, indem du nur Iai-Jutsu mit Shuraba verwendest. (Für Iai-Jutsu Y gedrückt halten.)
description.french: Tue 20 ennemis en n'utilisant que le Iai-Jutsu avec Shuraba. (Maintiens enfoncé Y.)
description.italian: Uccidi 20 nemici usando solo Iai-Jutsu con Shuraba. (Iai-Jutsu: tieni premuto <BUTTON_Y>.)
description.japanese: 「修羅刃」を装備して「居合い」で敵を20体倒せ（「居合い」はYボタンを長押しして発動）

description.english: While never setting foot on the ground, grab enemies 10 times using Kulshedra.
description.spanish: Coge a enemigos diez veces usando a Kulshedra sin pisar el suelo.
description.german: Greife mit Hilfe von Kulshedra 10 Mal nach Feinden, ohne den Boden zu berühren.
description.french: Sans poser le pied à terre, agrippe 10 ennemis avec Kulshedra.
description.italian: Afferra i nemici 10 volte usando Kulshedra senza mai toccare terra.
description.japanese: 「クルセドラ」を装備して一度も地上に降りることなく敵を10回引き寄せろ

displayName.japanese: 凍りつくほど魅せてあげる

description.english: Freeze 20 enemies while wearing Odette.
description.spanish: Congela a 20 enemigos mientras llevas los Odette.
description.german: Lass 20 Feinde erstarren, während du Odette trägst.
description.french: Gèle 20 ennemis en portant Odette.
description.italian: Congela 20 nemici indossando Odette.
description.japanese: 「オデット」を履いて敵を20体凍らせろ

description.english: Purchase three new techniques.
description.spanish: Compra tres técnicas nuevas.
description.german: Erwirb drei neue Techniken.

description.italian: Acquista tre nuove tecniche.

description.spanish: Compra todas las técnicas.
description.german: Erwirb alle Techniken.
description.french: Achète toutes les techniques.
description.italian: Acquista tutte le tecniche.
description.japanese: 技を全て修得

description.english: Obtain three complete Angelic Hymn Gold LPs.
description.spanish: Consigue 3 Discos de oro de Himnos angelicales completos.
description.german: Erlange drei komplette goldene LPs der Engelshymnen.
description.french: Obtiens trois disques d'or d'hymnes angéliques complets.
description.italian: Ottieni tre LP d'oro di inni angelici completi.
description.japanese: レコードを３種類 完成

description.english: Obtain seven complete Angelic Hymn Gold LPs.
description.spanish: Consigue 7 Discos de oro de Himnos angelicales completos.
description.german: Erlange sieben komplette goldene LPs der Engelshymnen.
description.french: Obtiens sept disques d'or d'hymnes angéliques complets.
description.italian: Ottieni sette LP d'oro di inni angelici completi.
description.japanese: レコードを７種類 完成

description.english: Discover half of all the Umbra Witches' final resting places.
description.spanish: Descubre la mitad de los lugares de descanso eterno de las Brujas de Umbra.
description.german: Entdecke die Hälfte der letzten Ruhestätten der Umbra-Hexen.
description.french: Découvre la moitié des cercueils des sorcières de l'Umbra.
description.italian: Scopri metà dei luoghi di riposo delle Streghe di Umbra.
description.japanese: 魔女の棺を1/2発見

description.english: Discover all of the Umbra Witches' final resting places.
description.spanish: Descubre todos los lugares de descanso eterno de las Brujas de Umbra.
description.german: Entdecke sämtliche der letzten Ruhestätten der Umbra-Hexen.
description.french: Découvre tous les cercueils des sorcières de l'Umbra.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i luoghi di riposo delle Streghe di Umbra.
description.japanese: 魔女の棺を全て発見

description.english: Discover all Alfheim portals.
description.spanish: Descubre todos los portales de Alfheim.
description.german: Entdecke alle Portale von Alfheim.
description.french: Découvre tous les portails d'Alfheim.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i portali Alfheim.
description.japanese: 「アルフヘイム」を全て発見

displayName.japanese: エンジェル メイ クライ

description.english: Complete half of all Alfheim portals.
description.spanish: Completa la mitad de los portales de Alfheim.
description.german: Schließe die Hälfte der Portale von Alfheim ab.
description.french: Termine la moitié des portails d'Alfheim.
description.italian: Completa metà dei portali Alfheim.
description.japanese: 「アルフヘイム」を1/2クリア

displayName.japanese: エンジェルスレイヤー

description.english: Complete all Alfheim portals.
description.spanish: Completa todos los portales de Alfheim.
description.german: Schließe alle Portale von Alfheim ab.
description.french: Termine tous les portails d'Alfheim.
description.italian: Completa tutti i portali Alfheim.
description.japanese: 「アルフヘイム」を全てクリア

displayName.spanish: La verdad en su forma más pura

description.english: Collect all of Antonio's Notes.
description.spanish: Recopila todas las notas de Antonio.
description.german: Sammle alle Notizen Antonios.
description.french: Ramasse toutes les notes d'Antonio.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli Appunti di Antonio.
description.japanese: 「アントニオの手記」を全て収集

description.english: Destroy all the tentacles that drop down together during in single sequence in Chapter 9.
description.spanish: Destruye todos los tentáculos que caen en una secuencia única del capítulo 9.
description.german: Vernichte alle Tentakel, die in einer einzelnen Angriffswelle in Kap. 9 herunterfallen.
description.french: Détruis tous les tentacules qui tombent ensemble en même temps au chapitre 9.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti i tentacoli che scendono in una sequenza nel capitolo 9.
description.japanese: チャプター9で「触手」を一度の落下で全て倒せ

description.english: Defend Cereza during the out of body experience, ensuring she takes no damage.
description.spanish: Defiende a Cereza durante la experiencia excorporal y asegúrate de que no le hagan daño.
description.german: Verteidige Cereza während ihrer außerkörperlichen Erfahrung, damit ihr nichts passiert.
description.french: Défends Cereza en sortant de ton corps, et en t'assurant qu'elle ne subisse aucun dégât.
description.italian: Difendi Cereza durante l'esperienza extra-corporale, assicurandoti che non subisca danni.
description.japanese: 霊体戦闘でセレッサを無傷で守り抜け

description.english: Earn Platinum Medals during Verse 1 and Verse 2 of Chapter 14.
description.spanish: Gana medallas de platino durante los versículos 1 y 2 del capítulo 14.
description.german: Verdiene dir Platinmedaillen in Vers 1 und Vers 2 von Kapitel 14.
description.french: Gagne des médailles de platine durant les versets 1 et 2 du chapitre 14.
description.italian: Ottieni Medaglie di platino durante i versi 1 e 2 del capitolo 14.
description.japanese: チャプター14で Verse 1 と Verse 2 のプラチナメダルを獲得しろ

displayName.english: Just In The Nick Of Time

description.english: Dodge the runaway streetcar during Chapter 2.
description.german: Weiche der entgleisten Straßenbahn in Kapitel 2 aus.
description.french: Esquive le tramway fou au chapitre 2.
description.italian: Schiva la macchina nel capitolo 2.
description.spanish: Esquiva el tranvía durante el capítulo 2.
description.japanese: チャプター2で暴走列車を回避しろ
